name: Heading
value: Get in Touch About Laravel Boilerplate

name: Description
value: Have questions about the Laravel Boilerplate, want to collaborate, or need more information? Our team is ready to help you accelerate your Laravel development with a clean code structure, ready-to-use features, and clear documentation. This open source project is available for anyone who wants to build Laravel apps to industry standards.
